Plot: Harry Caine, a blind writer, reaches this moment in time when he has to heal his wounds from 14 years back. He was then still known by his real name, Mateo Blanco, and directing his last movie.
Title: Broken Embraces
Actors: Penélope Cruz, Lluís Homar, Blanca Portillo, José Luis Gómez
tomatoConsensus: Pedro Almodovar's fourth film with Penélope Cruz isn't his finest work, but he brings his signature visual brilliance to this noirish tale, and the cast turns in some first-class performances.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 8 wins & 37 nominations.
